markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Compass of Transpositional Awareness](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1638)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 154

**Price** 950 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The silver face of this glass-encased compass is etched with dozens of esoteric symbols, obscure icons, and inscrutable abbreviations.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> concentrate, Interact;  **Frequency** once per minute;   **Effect** You point the _compass of transpositional awareness_ at an extant [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156) effect (such as a magical portal) or the site of a teleportation effect that existed within the last 1 minute (such as the space where a creature just cast [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69)). Attempt an [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) check to determine to where the effect leads or led. The DC of this check is the effect's [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) DC. On a success, you know roughly the destination of the teleportation effect (for example “the [Plane of Fire](/Planes.aspx?ID=6),” “north,” or “Avistan”). On a critical success, you ascertain the exact destination within mere feet for local effects (such as _dimension door_) or within a few miles for long-range effects (such as [_teleport_](/Spells.aspx?ID=338), [_plane shift_](/Spells.aspx?ID=222), or interdimensional portals).

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" />  ;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You use the _compass of transpositional awareness_ to triangulate your current coordinates and the coordinates of your intended destination using teleportation magic. For 1 minute, whenever you cast a [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156) spell that has a range, increase that spell's range by 30 feet. If the spell normally has a range of touch, extend its range to 30 feet.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Compass of Transpositional Awareness
